document_data.name: Grottoes of the Nine Sages
document_data.mainbody: The '''Grottoes of the Nine Sages''' were a series of nine caves within the [[Horseshoe Temple Oasis]] in the [[Quoya Desert]] of the [[Hordelands]] during the mid 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.History: Each cave was once a shrine dedicated to one of the Nine Sacred Sages of the Pathâ€”these being [[Chou Zhiangpen]], [[Ta-wan]], [[Tai Hsueh-chi]], [[Li Chih-wu]], [[Yao Tsung-i]], [[P'eng Khaisan]], [[Hung Te Ping]], [[Hsiao Tzu-chi]], and [[Pieh-chi]]. As of the {{YearlinkName|1358}}, the caves were overrun with [[goblin]]s.
document_data.Description: A statue of each Sage stood within their respective cave, usually facing the entryway.
